Summary: I saw 3 lights equally spaced apart.
divs: Sighting DetailsI've already sent you the information on my "would-be sighting." This is a follow up email to let you know that I found perhaps what could be additional evidence. I was cutting the grass today and happened to notice two circles in the tall grass that were longer and greener than the rest of the grass. A rough guess would be that the circles were each 20' in circumference. One was in the approximate area where I had viewed the lights in the pictures I sent previously. The other was farther to the left of our backyard. I saw nothing in that area. I will attach the pictures I took of the grass. I do have more if you wish to see them but these are the ones that turned out the best. Pictures 49 & 50 were in the area where I saw the lights. #62 is of the other circle. Please note that I had started cutting through the first circle before I realized that this might be important evidence. Of course, I am not sure what this was but I thought it seemed strange. Thank You
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oakland
There was one other sighting in Oakland on or around July 24th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
